name: Sarlin
content:
Sarlin was a male Twi'lek smuggler who lived during the Galactic Civil War.
In 1 ABY, Sarlin resided in Mos Entha. While there, he received a contraband shipment from a smuggler working for [[B
Sarlin was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Sarlin was added to the game along with the smuggling missions introduced with the "Chapter 3" update, released on September 27, 2006.
In the game, Barak tasked smugglers with delivering contraband to various NPCs, including Sarlin.
